title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. V, pt. 204 - Prohibited Conduct
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. V, pt. 204 - Prohibited Conduct

State Regulations
§ 204.0 - Applicability
§ 204.1 - Pedestrians
§ 204.2 - Hitchhiking; loitering
§ 204.3 - Rowdy, dangerous conduct
§ 204.4 - Animals
§ 204.5 - Littering; polluting
§ 204.6 - Throwing of objects; jumping
§ 204.7 - Damage to authority property
§ 204.8 - Snowmobiles; snow travelers
§ 204.9 - Towing
§ 204.10 - Airplanes; jets; helicopters
§ 204.11 - Picnicking; consumption of food, beverages
§ 204.12 - Liquor; intoxicating beverages; drugs
§ 204.13 - Commercial activity; posting of signs; solicitation of funds
§ 204.14 - Firearms; fireworks
§ 204.15 - Interference with authority operations
§ 204.16 - Banners; flags; signs
§ 204.17 - Interference with lawful passage
§ 204.18 - Waiver of rules

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. V, pt. 204

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §§ 528[2]
538[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
